title:
Technology News | ⚡iMessage, Microsoft Edge, Bing and Ad Business Get 
Breather Ahead of New EU DMA ACT
text: By IANS “The Commission has adopted decisions closing four market investigations that were launched on September 5, 2023 under the Digital Markets Act (DMA), finding that Apple and Microsoft should not be designated as gatekeepers for the following core platform services,” it said in a statement.
